heroAbilities.name: Death's Harvest
heroAbilities.text: Once per round, when a minion dies on an enemy player's turn, gain 1 lifeforce.

heroAbilities.name: Keeper of the Dead
heroAbilities.text: At the end of your turn you may send 1 minion from your deck to your graveyard.

heroAbilities.name: Necrotic Strength
heroAbilities.text: During your turn, when you summon a minion from the graveyard, it gains +1 attack until the end of the turn.

heroAbilities.name: Death's Bargain
heroAbilities.text: Once during each of your turns, you can resurrect a minion from your graveyard by paying its cost. At the end of your turn, banish the minion from the game.

heroAbilities.name: Early Entombment
heroAbilities.text: At the start of the game you may send 4 minions from your deck that cost 1 or less to the greveyard.

heroAbilities.name: Toxic Webs
heroAbilities.text: Ensnared enemy minions have their defense reduced by 2.

heroAbilities.name: Web
heroAbilities.text: Once per turn, you may spend 2 lifeforce to ensnare a target minion in a web, preventing it from receiving Minion Commands for 1 round.

heroAbilities.name: Swarm
heroAbilities.text: Once during each of your turns you may spend 6 lifeforce to summon a number of minions from the graveyard with a combined cost of 4 or less.

heroAbilities.name: Hell's Favor
heroAbilities.text: The first minion you play each turn cost 2 less.

heroAbilities.name: Soul Harvest
heroAbilities.text: During your turn you can destroy friendly minions to gain 1 lifeforce for each. Their effects are negated.

heroAbilities.name: Soul Weave
heroAbilities.text: Once during each of your turns, you may spend 3 lifeforce to empower a minion, increasing its attack and defense by 3. The minion is destroyed at the end of your turn.

heroAbilities.name: Dark Summoning
heroAbilities.text: Once during each of your turns, you may spend 3 lifeforce to summon two 1 cost minions from your hand, deck, or graveyard.

heroAbilities.name: Blood Harvet
heroAbilities.text: Gain 1 health whenever a minion dies during your turn, up to a maximum of 4 health per turn.

heroAbilities.name: Blood Magic
heroAbilities.text: Once during each of your turns, you can cast the Draw or Destroy Magic Hero Abilities using Health instead of Lifeforce.

heroAbilities.name: Dominate Will
heroAbilities.text: Once during each of your turns, you may spend 4 lifeforce to temporarily take control of an enemy minion. You take damage equal to that minions lifeforce cost. At the end of your turn, return the minion to the opponent, regardless of its status.

heroAbilities.name: Judgment of the Dead
heroAbilities.text: Once during each of your turns, you may spend 6 lifeforce. The cards you play this turn cost health instead of lifeforce, up to 10 health.

heroAbilities.name: Arcane Infusion
heroAbilities.text: The first two spells you cast each round regenerate 1 lifeforce.

heroAbilities.name: Witching Hour
heroAbilities.text: You can cast spells at any time during either player's turn.

heroAbilities.name: Conjure Familiar
heroAbilities.text: Once during each of your turns, you may spend 3 lifeforce to summon a 2 or less cost minion from your deck or graveyard.

heroAbilities.name: Occult Insight
heroAbilities.text: Once during each of your turns, you may cast a spell with a cost of 5 or less from your deck by paying its cost plus an additional lifeforce.

heroAbilities.name: Guided Hand
heroAbilities.text: Once during each of your turns, if you draw a minion, reveal it, and then draw another card.

heroAbilities.name: Reanimate
heroAbilities.text: If at the start of your turn you controlled less minions than your opponent, you can spend 2 lifeforce to resurrect a minion for your graveyard that costs 3 or less.

heroAbilities.name: Press the Advantage
heroAbilities.text: If at the start of your turn you controlled more minions than your opponent, you can spend 2 lifeforce to increase the attack of all of your minons by 1 until the end of the turn.

heroAbilities.name: Corpse Explosion
heroAbilities.text: Once during each of your turns, you may spend 2 lifeforce to destroy a minion you control then deal 2 damage to all enemy minions.

heroAbilities.name: Remnants of the Past
heroAbilities.text: Instead of drawing a card from your deck during your draw phase, you may draw a card of your choice from your graveyard. If you do, send the top card of your deck to the graveyard.

heroAbilities.name: Moment of Ascension
heroAbilities.text: Once during your turn, when you draw a card from your deck or graveyard that costs 5 or less, you may play it for free this turn. If you do, banish it at the end of the turn.

heroAbilities.name: Hand of the Forgotten King
heroAbilities.text: Once during your turn, you may pay 2 Lifeforce to return a banished card to your deck.

heroAbilities.name: Path of the Afterlife
heroAbilities.text: Once during your turn, you may pay 2 Lifeforce to send a card from your deck to your graveyard.

heroAbilities.name: Spellweaver's Boon
heroAbilities.text: The first spell you cast from your hand each turn costs 2 less Lifeforce.

heroAbilities.name: Spellfire Mastery
heroAbilities.text: Your Magic cards inflict 1 extra damage.

heroAbilities.name: Reclaimed Knowledge
heroAbilities.text: Once during your turn, you may pay 2 Lifeforce to return a spell from your graveyard to your hand.

heroAbilities.name: Arcane Restoration
heroAbilities.text: Once per turn, you may pay 3 Lifeforce to either heal a hero for 3 or give a minion +2 Defense until the end of the turn.

heroAbilities.name: Scorching Sunfire
heroAbilities.text: Once during your turn, you may pat 2 Lifeforce to inflict 2 damage to then enemy  hero.

heroAbilities.name: Wrath of the Sun God
heroAbilities.text: At the start of your turn, select an enemy hero, if they control more minions than you, inflict damage to them equal to the difference up to a max of 2 damage.

heroAbilities.name: Burning Vengeance
heroAbilities.text: Once during your turn, if an enemy hero takes at least 5 damage, force them to discard from their hand.

heroAbilities.name: Pyre of Souls
heroAbilities.text: Once during your turn, you may choose three cards from your graveyard, remove them from the game then draw a card.

heroAbilities.name: Tainted Ground
heroAbilities.text: At the start of your turn, you may designate an enemy minion slot. Minions in that slot have their Attack and Defense reduced by 2 until you choose a different slot.

heroAbilities.name: Aura of Decay
heroAbilities.text: At the end of your turn, each enemy character adjacent to another character takes 2 damage.

heroAbilities.name: Fury of the Void
heroAbilities.text: If you control no minions at the start of your turn, ensnare an enemy minion, preventing it from receiving Minion Commands for one round.

heroAbilities.name: Shifting Sands
heroAbilities.text: You may pay 2 Lifeforce to move an enemy minion to a different slot on its controller's field.
